publication.title: Scaling of the quantum approximate optimization algorithm on superconducting qubit based hardware

approximation ratio.description: The depth-two QAOA found the maximum cut and the approximation ratio is 1.

time-to-solution.description: Time-to-solution is reported as the Qiskit Runtime usage and includes the full variational optimization. Qiskit Runtime usage is the time a job spends leveraging the Qiskit Runtime architecture. It includes quantum compute and near-time classical pre- and post-processing. Queue time is not included.
